alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Somerset; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 26 at 4:53AM EDT until March 26 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SOME ACCUMULATING SNOW AND MIXED PRECIPITATION CONTINUES THIS MORNING... .Snow will continue in the advisory this morning. Some additional accumulation expected. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches for a storm total of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of south central, southwest, west central, and western Maine. * WHEN...Until Noon EDT today. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Somerset; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Northern Franklin; Southern Franklin; Southern Somerset
